timeline.bodyText: Maybe "temporarily banned the IP address" would be more distinct wording here.
timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -391,6 +391,7 @@ payToggleOff=\u00a76You are no longer accepting payments.
 payToggleOn=\u00a76You are now accepting payments.
 pendingTeleportCancelled=\u00a74Pending teleportation request cancelled.
 playerBanIpAddress=\u00a76Player\u00a7c {0} \u00a76banned IP address\u00a7c {1} \u00a76for\: \u00a7c{2}\u00a76.
+playerTempBanIpAddress=\u00a76Player\u00a7c {0} \u00a76banned IP address \u00a7c{1}\u00a76 for \u00a7c{2}\u00a76\: \u00a7c{3}\u00a76.

timeline.bodyText: I would go for "Temporarily" (also don't forget the period at the end).
timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -428,6 +428,10 @@ commands:
     description: Temporary ban a user.
     usage: /<command> <playername> <datediff> <reason>
     aliases: [etempban]
+  tempbanip:
+    description: Temporary ban an IP Address

timeline.author: pop4959
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -428,6 +428,10 @@ commands:
     description: Temporary ban a user.
     usage: /<command> <playername> <datediff> <reason>
     aliases: [etempban]
+  tempbanip:
+    description: Temporary ban an IP Address
+    usage: /<command> <playername> <dateddiff> <reason>
